SELECT e.lecture_name lable ,(SUM(assignment_submit_score)/COUNT(assignment_exam_no)) data FROM assignment_submit a INNER JOIN education e ON a.education_no = e.education_no INNER JOIN lecture l ON l.lecture_name = e.lecture_name
GROUP BY e.lecture_name
SELECT e.lecture_name lable ,(COUNT(e.lecture_name)) data FROM education e INNER JOIN drop_record d ON e.education_no = d.education_no GROUP BY e.lecture_name
SELECT lecture_name lable ,SUM(YEAR(NOW())-YEAR(student_birth))/COUNT(student_name) data FROM student s INNER JOIN education e ON s.login_id = e.login_id GROUP BY lecture_name
SELECT student_gender lable ,(COUNT(student_gender)/(SELECT COUNT(student_gender) FROM student))*100 data FROM student GROUP BY student_gender
SELECT lecture_name lable ,COUNT(lecture_name)-1 data FROM lecture WHERE lecture_active = '1' GROUP BY lecture_name
SELECT graduate lable ,((COUNT(student_name)/(SELECT COUNT(student_name) FROM student))*100) data FROM student GROUP BY graduate
SELECT major_name lable ,(count(major_name)/(SELECT COUNT(login_id) FROM student))*100 data FROM major WHERE major_name LIKE '%컴퓨터%' OR major_name LIKE '%소프트웨어%'
